channel.title: Hats showing up in weapon spot
channel.description: Hey guys, I just had a quick question about some custom items. Things like custom partyhats, Pink, Orange, Black, etc. are showing up in the weapon spot when I weild them, causing my weapon to become un-equiped. And yes I have put the id's of the hats in the item.java and item4.java, any suggestions?

item.title: Hats showing up in weapon spot
item.dc:creator: @OwnageDBOW OwnageDBOW
item.description:
@OwnageDBOW wrote:

I had the same issue. You have to add them in the correct spot in the item class. For the partyhats go to your item class and search public static int hats[] =
At the end of it post your customs IDs. I don’t know other so I can’t help. Also don’t forget to compile!

Read full topic
item.source: Hats showing up in weapon spot
